Question 58 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Aptitude
In a company, 35% employees drink coffee, 40% drink tea and 10% drink both tea and coffee. Then how 
much % of employees will neither drink tea nor coffee?  
 
 
[1 Mark]
(A) 25 
(B) 35 
(C) 40 
(D) 15
Sol. 
Given :
 
Employees drink coffee = 35%
Employees drink tea = 40%
Employees drink both tea and coffee = 10%
